description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' inheriting from 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell'. It uses Google Mock to create mock methods for the interface, primarily intended for unit testing. The class mocks various methods related to service information, control, and subsystem interactions.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IShell interface for testing purposes, providing mock methods for all interface functions.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign identifier.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix URL.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns the configuration line.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns the persistent storage path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns the volatile storage path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns the data storage path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported based on the provided uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the subsystem interface.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a task or event with identifier and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with specified strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries for an interface by call sign and reason.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification callback.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model string.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if the service is running in background.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns the accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path to proxy stub.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns the hash key string.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs substitution on the input string.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason code.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason code.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for current state changes.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns system root path.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns system path.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns plugin path.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the service start mode.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Provides metadata information.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernates the service with a timeout.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Retrieves library search paths based on a given string.
